introCutscene.speaker: Lyra
introCutscene.text: There's a divine presence here. But it feels...corrupted. Profane, even.

introCutscene.speaker: Thump
introCutscene.text: I can feel a spirit. A powerful one. But she's fading!

introCutscene.speaker: Vicas
introCutscene.text: Look! Civilians! That must be Meris's family.

introCutscene.speaker: Azrael
introCutscene.text: This is dredging up some painful memories...

introCutscene.speaker: Rooker
introCutscene.text: Look at those runes on the shrine. We need to act fast!

introCutscene.speaker: Vessan
introCutscene.text: Three hundred years I have waited. Three hundred years of silence, of solitude, of unwavering faith...

introCutscene.speaker: Vessan
introCutscene.text: And now you come to undo it all? Very well. Let us see if your conviction burns as brightly as mine.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Narrator
victoryCutscene.text: Vessan is defeated, and the spirits begin to settle.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Narrator
victoryCutscene.text: You touch Quetzi, but her scales are colder than the oncoming winter.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Mickell
victoryCutscene.text: We came to burn her an offering. She kept Vessan from hurting us.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dalrick
victoryCutscene.text: We owe her, and you all, everything.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dalrick
victoryCutscene.text: We've got to get her back to Ishetar, and fast!
